snippet: Based on a preliminary analysis, the Los Angeles County coroner’s office reaffirmed on Wednesday that Andrew R. Getty, an heir to the Getty oil fortune, died from what appeared to have been natural or accidental causes.
abstract: Los Angeles County coroner's office reaffirms Andrew R Getty, 47, heir to Getty oil fortune, died at his home from apparent natural or accidental causes but says investigation is continuing; Getty family has publicly dealt over decades with kidnapping, drug addiction and odd deaths.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and MICHAEL CIEPLY
byline.contributor: Noah Smith contributed reporting, and Susan Beachy contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Based on a preliminary analysis, the Los Angeles County coroner’s office reaffirmed on Wednesday that Andrew R. Getty, an heir to the Getty oil fortune, died from what appeared to have been natural or accidental causes.

headline.main: Gettys Again Made to Cope With Grief in Public Eye
headline.print_headline: Gettys Again Made to Cope With Grief in Public Eye
